1.0.name: wordpress/fix-post-title-capitalization
1.0.description: This plugin automatically fixes the capitalization in post titles. It checks for small words including 'of','a','the','and','an','or','nor','but','is','if','then','else' ,'when', 'at','from','by','on','off','for','in','out','over','to','into','with' and changes them to lowercase as is normal in the English language. It will update the capitilization of all current and new posts when activated. Any new posts that are created while this plugin is activated will have their post title capitalization automatically fixed upon submission of the new post.
